::FZ::

FZ nods. "I'll see if Wheeljack can do it when he gets back. If not, we'll get you a Maximal pod. Follow me, I'll take you to the equipment room."

He walks off toward a door, motioning for Vamprah to follow.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Vamprah:
> 
> "A maximal would be better"replied Vamprah "Maximals aren't idiot and

> an expert that could convert a predacon pod into a Maximal"
